title: Dragon platebody (g)

properties.value: The dragon platebody (g) is a dragon platebody with a dragon platebody ornament kit attached to it, and is part of Dragon gold-trimmed armour. The attached ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the platebody. It costs 16,692,691 for both the parts to make the dragon platebody (g).

The dragon platebody (g) is a dragon platebody with a dragon platebody ornament kit attached to it, and is part of Dragon gold-trimmed armour. The attached ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the platebody. It costs 16,692,691 for both the parts to make the dragon platebody (g).

While the platebody is untradeable in its ornamented state, it can be dismantled anytime, returning the tradeable platebody and ornament kit.

[[File:Dragon platebody (g) detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''dragon platebody (g)''' is a [[dragon platebody]] with a [[dragon platebody ornament kit]] attached to it, and is part of [[Dragon gold-trimmed armour]]. The attached ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the platebody. It costs {{Coins|{{GEP|Dragon platebody}}+{{GEP|Dragon platebody ornament kit}}}} for both the parts to make the dragon platebody (g).

While the platebody is untradeable in its ornamented state, it can be dismantled anytime, returning the tradeable platebody and ornament kit.
